article.title: Timeline_of_computing
article.paragraph: History of computingTimeline of computingpresents events in the history of computing organized by year and grouped into six topic areas: predictions and concepts, first use and inventions, hardware systems and processors, operating systems, programming languages, and new application areas. More detailed timelines are listed toward the end of the article.
